lead_paragraph: ORTIZ--Wanda. October 18, 1958 - June 1, 2015. Beloved mother, wife, daughter, sister, and friend to all. 1 year ago today the world became a little less beautiful. Forever in our hearts! Jessica and Richard 1/3
